headline: Founders that came from wealthy backgrounds
description:
5 out of the top 10 companies in this list https://www.ycombinator.com/topcompanies have a founder that went to a high school with a tuition. The rest have insufficient evidence. Below is a list of founders of successful companies and their respective high schools. The average high school tuition below exceeds the national average for College Tuition in the United States (about $28,000).

A notable exception is Jeff Bezos, who attended a Public High School, only received a $200,000 loan from his parents to start Amazon.

Phillips Exeter Academy Attendees (Tuition = $57,000) * Mark Zuckerberg (Founder of Facebook/Meta) * Adam D’Angelo (Founder of Quora

Middlesex School Attendee (Tuition = 68k) * Kevin Systrom (Founder of Instagram)

Crossroads School for Arts & Sciences in Santa Monica (Tuition = $38,000) * Evan Spiegel (Founder of Snapchat)

Bishop DuBourg High School Attendee (Tuition = $11,000) * Jack Dorsey (Founder of Twitter)

Lakeside High School Attendee (Tuition = $38,000) * Bill Gates (Founder of Microsoft) * Dan Kan (Founder of Cruise)

Pretoria Boys HS Attendee (Tuition = $4,000) * Elon Musk

Brookwood HS Attendee (Tuition = $13,000) * Joe Gebbia (Founder of AirBnB)

Bellarmine HS, San Jose Attendee (Tuition = $13,000) * Brian Armstrong

Harker HS, San Jose (Tuition varies by grade, but north of $40,000) * Andy Fang (Founder of Doordash)
headline_zh-Hans: 来自富裕背景的创始人
headline_zh-Hant: 來自富裕背景的創始人
description_zh-Hans:
在这个名单上的前10家公司中，有5家https://www.ycombinator.com/topcompanies，其创始人是上过有学费的高中的。其余的证据不足。 下面是成功公司的创始人和他们各自的高中名单。下面的平均高中学费超过了美国大学学费的全国平均水平（约28,000美元）。

一个明显的例外是杰夫-贝佐斯，他上的是公立高中，只是从他父母那里得到了20万美元的贷款来创办亚马逊。

菲利普斯-埃克塞特学院就读者（学费=57,000美元） * 马克-扎克伯格（Facebook/Meta的创始人） * 亚当-德安吉洛（Quora的创始人

米德尔塞克斯学校就读者（学费=68000） * 凯文-西斯特罗姆（Instagram的创始人）

Crossroads School for Arts &。科学在圣莫尼卡（学费=38,000美元）*埃文-斯皮格尔（Snapchat的创始人）

杜堡主教高中就读者（学费=11,000美元）*杰克-多尔西（Twitter的创始人）

湖畔高中就读者（学费=38,000美元）*比尔-盖茨（微软的创始人）*丹-坎（Cruise的创始人）

Pretoria Boys HS就读者（学费=4。

Bellarmine HS, San Jose Attendee (Tuition = $13,000) * Elon Musk

Brookwood HS Attendee (Tuition = $13,000) * Joe Gebbia (Founder of AirBnB)

Bellarmine HS, San Jose Attendee (Tuition = $13,000) * Brian Armstrong

Harker HS, San Jose (Tuition varies by grade, but north of $40,000) * Andy Fang (Founder of Doordash)
description_zh-Hant:
在這個名單上的前10家公司中，有5家https://www.ycombinator.com/topcompanies，其創始人是上過有學費的高中的。其餘的證據不足。 下面是成功公司的創始人和他們各自的高中名單。下面的平均高中學費超過了美國大學學費的全國平均水平（約28,000美元）。

一個明顯的例外是傑夫-貝佐斯，他上的是公立高中，只是從他父母那裡得到了20萬美元的貸款來創辦亞馬遜。
